attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cars towing caravans (mostly nose to tail) cause traffic jams and hold ups. They should have a road tax and also set times for travel. This proposition also includes farm trailers. The govt. needs more tax this is one way to get it and reduce congestion

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
